This property verifies that the CRC value is initialized to 32'hffffffff one clock cycle after the active-high Reset signal is asserted. 

The verification is triggered at every positive edge of the Clk signal, but is disabled when Reset is low. When Reset becomes high (1), the property requires that on the very next clock cycle, the Crc signal must equal 32'hffffffff.
